title: M4b format - The Amber Spyglass.  His Dark Materials book 3
description:
The Amber Spyglass is the third book in the "His Dark Materials" trilogy. This is the unabridged audiobook that I took from the files ripped from the 12 CDs. It's at 32 kb which is small but it is all you need for audiobooks (purchased itunes audiobooks are usually 32 kb as well). I used a program called join together which put it all together into one file and I added chapters so you can easily navigate. It's also a .m4b file which is a bookmarkable itunes file which means it will always remember the last place you listened which is convenient. It will not show up in the rest of your library it will only show up in the audiobook folder. And just so you know it's not a protected file... so enjoy!
